articles.title: Anushka Sharma Hugs Heartbroken Virat Kohli After India Loses ICC World Cup 2023 Final; See Viral Pic - News18
articles.description: Anushka Sharma was seen consoling Virat Kohli after team India lost the World Cup 2023 trophy to Australia.
articles.content: Anushka Sharma was seen consoling Virat Kohli after India lost the ICC World Cup 2023 final to Australia. In a photo shared on Twitter, now known as X, Anushka was seen hugging a heartbroken Virat af… [+1565 chars]

articles.title: India Vs Australia World Cup 2023 Final: Nia Sharma, Karan Kundrra, Aly Goni and others cheer for Team India - IndiaTimes
